LanguageData.FrontierTech_Westerado.label: Frontier Equipment
LanguageData.FrontierTech_Westerado.description: Researches Frontier Equipment. \n\nUnlocks the Bowie knife, trapper hat, and panning spot.
LanguageData.DistillingTech_Westerado.label: distilling
LanguageData.DistillingTech_Westerado.description: Build a distillery to distill plant matter into very strong alcohols.
LanguageData.PercussionTech_Westerado.label: percussion lock
LanguageData.PercussionTech_Westerado.description: Craft simple manually-operated percussion lock guns like pistols, and rifles.
LanguageData.SingleActionTech_Westerado.label: single-action
LanguageData.SingleActionTech_Westerado.description: Craft intricate manually-operated single-actions guns like revolvers, and breech-loading rifles.
LanguageData.DoubleActionTech_Westerado.label: double-action
LanguageData.DoubleActionTech_Westerado.description: Craft complex manually-operated double-action guns like revolvers.
LanguageData.RepeatingActionTech_Westerado.label: repeating action
LanguageData.RepeatingActionTech_Westerado.descriptio: Craft intricate manually-operated lever-action, lever-action shotguns, and repeating rifles.
LanguageData.BoltActionTech_Westerado.label: bolt action
LanguageData.BoltActionTech_Westerado.description: Craft complex manually-operated bolt action guns like pistols, rifles, and sniper rifles.
LanguageData.BreakActionTech_Westerado.label: break-action
LanguageData.BreakActionTech_Westerado.description: Craft simple manually-operated break-action guns, like coach guns.
LanguageData.PumpActionTech_Westerado.label: pump-action
LanguageData.PumpActionTech_Westerado.description: Craft intricate manually-operated pump-action guns like pump shotguns.
